titleInfo.title: "Bluntly, He'd Rather Not Have that Bozo Introduced"

mods.abstract: Editorial cartoon by Jack Knox depicting President Franklin D. Roosevelt attempting to introduce the "food subsidy program" to the U.S. Congress. The man depicting Congress is shown replying, "Sorry--But I ain't makin' any new acquaintances." The cartoon is titled, "Bluntly, He'd Rather Not Have that Bozo Introduced." The cartoon is possibly referring to the creation of the Federal Surplus Relief Corporation.
